posts.post_content:
A very large grouping of the Series 7 set is available in this single offering.  On the whole, this is a pretty attractive group of cards. Very few of the cards have any sort of significant creasing or wear on them.  A few have corner chipping or a small amount of back damage.  There are no "dogs" in this group though and all of the cards are still quite displayable.  


-----------------------------------------------

t210-7s
Beatty (Raleigh) GD - wrinkle free, corner wear, tiny spot of damage on back --- $90
Bonner (Rocky Mount) GD - wrinkle free, corner wear, tiny bits of residue on back--- $90
Cowell (Wilson) PR/FR - creasing on front, small areas of damage on the back. --- $50
Dailey (Goldsboro) FR/GD - some corner chipping on front, no wrinkles, tiny bits of wear on reverse  --- $80
Dussault  (Rocky Mount) PR/FR - creasing on front --- $45
Evans (Goldsboro) FR - nice VG front, one spider wrinkle, some residue and damage on back  --- $65
Fulton (Goldsboro)  FR - very nice VG front, no wrinkling, some residue and damage on back  --- $65
Gastmeyer (Rocky Mount) (bat) FR/GD - one wrinkle on front, tiny bits of residue on reverse --- $80
Gastmeyer (Rocky Mount) (field) FR - one wrinkle on front, mild residue on reverse  --- $65
Gunderson (Goldsboro) PR/FR - Tough card in set! nice VG front, no wrinkling, significant back damage --- $100
Ham (Raleigh) GD - Tough card in set!  VG front, no wrinkling, tiny spot of damage on reverse --- $125
Hart (Raleigh) FR - couple wrinkles, edge chipping on front, mostly clean, damage free on back  --- $65
Kaiser (Goldsboro) GD/VG - strong VG front, no wrinkling, bits of residue on back --- $100
Kelley (Raleigh) PR/FR - spot of damage on front, no wrinkling, "dirty" back --- $50
Kelly (Goldsboro....NOT the Mascot!) GD - couple wrinkles on front, mostly clean and damage free on back --- $125
Phalean (Rocky Mount) PR/FR - wrinkling, edgewear, some back damage --- $45
Reeves (Rocky Mount) PR/FR - crease on bottom, mild back damage --- $50
Steinbach (Goldsboro) FR - small "streaks" on front, mild residue on back --- $65
Taylor (Goldsboro) FR - couple chips in borders, corner wrinkle, mild residue on back --- $65
Wright (Raleigh) PR/FR - fading/residue on front, significant back damage --- $50

 [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=38500&d=1305509716[/IMG]-

Brian, cool grouping! If you EVER decide to sell any cards individually I would be strongly interested in the Creagan (Rocky Mount) card as I need it to go with the Jim Thorpe PC I found in David Creagan's personal correspondence I picked up a while back.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=127277&highlight=david+creagan[/url]

-Rhett

Removed the cards that have been sold and dropped the price on all the cards remaining for individual sale. Still plenty to choose from with quite a few of the tougher ones remaining!  Thanks again,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks for the nice transaction on Cooney. I'll see you in Chicago Brian!
tbob

Brian,

Card arrived safely today.  Very pleased with transaction.

Dave
Dave and Bob - thanks for the kind words, it was a pleasure working with you both!! :)
Brian, Cards came today. Can't thank you enough... AMAZING

Thanks Ralph and everyone who I've worked with lately on the t210s.  I updated the list just now - down to only 20 t210s left!!
Thanks!
Brian
email sent on all that are left
All t210s sold!  This seems to be a set a few more people are collecting now that everyone's back from the National....
